name: Of Fate and Snow
description:
Explore an icy cave full of dangerous creatures, and find out what lies beneath the thick snow.

Whatever happens, remember that Fate is inevitable.

  • Defeat creatures and resurrect them into your party members.
  • Replace your heart and soul with the creatures' to gain their powers. Choose from 10 different creatures, each with their own heart and souls. 
  • Customize each your party member's stats on every level up. Max out the ATK stat for your glass cannon, or put them all on DEF/HP for your giga tank, or maybe split AGI/DEF/MP evenly for a fast tank/support hybrid.
  • Remember--both people and creatures die when they are killed!

Controls:

  • Z - Accept/Interact
  • X - Cancel/Open Menu (hold to fast-forward text)
  • Arrow keys - Move around/selection

Tip: Early game might be quite difficult. Make sure to save often and heal when you need it. Don't be afraid to run from battles you can't win!

Average length: 1 hour
